title: The futures for Jason Garrett, Doug Marrone, Urban Meyer and Derek Carr (Football 12/23)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Jason La Canfora for observations on Week 16 in the NFL and to evaluate the futures of several coaches and players across the league. Will and JLC dissect the likely end of Jason Garrett's tenure in Dallas (4:45), Derek Carr heading towards a breakup with the Raiders (14:30), Doug Marrone's chances of sticking around in Jacksonville (21:30) and links between the Cleveland Browns and Urban Meyer (30:30).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
